mapper.select: select s.id, user_id, hospital_id, h.hospital_name from sys_user_hospital s left join hospital_info h on s.hospital_id = h.id where s.delete_flag = '0' and user_id = #{sysUserId}
select id from sys_user where delete_flag = 0 and user_id = #{userId}
select hospital_id from sys_user_hospital suf left join sys_user u on suf.user_id = u.id where suf.delete_flag = 0 and u.user_id = #{userId}
